title: Why am I not getting Blue Essence after a match?
body: When I opened my game after the update, I had 3,999 BE and I played a match and I still have the same amount of BE. Please help.{{champion:103}}

replies.body: I think you might be confusing Blue Essence with how IP used to work. You don't get BE from playing matches like you did IP since there are multiple other ways of getting essence (chests and disenchanting shards).
